alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 12 at 1:41PM MST until December 15 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts of 60 mph to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Apache county and the Black Mesa area. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may damage property and cause power outages. Moderate to heavy rain and snow are also expected to accompany this strong cold front passage causing areas of reduced visibility in blowing snow and dangered travel.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
